wikipedia_page.main: Edward Johnson Bellerby LRAM (28 March 1858 – 2 April 1940) was an English organist, composer and teacher.

response: He studied organ under Dr. William Spark, the Leeds Borough Organist, and succeeded Edward Johnson Bellerby after a competition to elect his successor.Leeds Mercury, 18 November 1881

link_mentions.page: List of musicians at English cathedrals

response: He was the son of organist Edward Johnson Bellerby. He was an Army chaplain during the First World War. He was headmaster of King Edward's School, Witley, (1926–1951) and Governor of St Lawrence College, Ramsgate.
